creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: fan-shaped ornament covered with relief designs which include insects, birds, floral, and foliate motifs; ring at top attached with smaller rings and two pair six-lobed, flower-like designs forming a chain
dimension: 5 1/2 x 4 15/16 x 3/8 in. (13.97 x 12.54 x 0.95 cm) (including chain)
title: Ornament, one of a pair
